content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-14.5, -48.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) extracting iron ore.
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) storing extracted iron ore.
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone Furnace at position (-11.0, -48.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone Furnace at position (-9.0, -48.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -47.5) for additional storage.
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5) transferring items between entities.

### Coal Supply Facility at Position (41.5, -80.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) extracting coal.
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -80.5) storing extracted coal.
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0) using coal as fuel.
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) transferring items between entities.
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -79.5) for additional storage.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities with insufficient space
- Ensure there is enough space and no collisions with existing entities when placing new structures. Consider increasing the spacing or changing the direction or reference position to avoid placement errors.

### Errors due to insufficient inventory items
- Verify that you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into entities. This will prevent errors related to missing inventory items.

### Inserter waiting for source items
- Ensure that the source entity has items available for the inserter to transfer. This can be achieved by maintaining a steady supply of resources to the source entity.
